data.convo: How much for these autographed Elvis records ? Thirty bucks a record . Or five for one hundred and twenty bucks . Uh , I'm not sure . Are these all in good condition ? Absolutely . I bought them from the King's estate myself ! Tell you what-I'll let you have five for one hundred bucks . I don't really need five . OK . Five for eighty-five bucks . That's my final offer . Oh , why not ? I'll take ' em .
